blog.name: trenchnote
blog.title: I want a little peace of mind to turn to~

summary:
So... 
Jaime and Brienne are expected to have numerous scenes together in the next season of Game of Thrones...
The Good Omens...
body:
So…

Jaime and Brienne are expected to have numerous scenes together in the next season of Game of Thrones…

The Good Omens adaptation is set to release soon in April…

The last season of Gotham is airing in March, and Robin just told us that his favorite scene he’s ever done for Ed and Oz is in the fifth episode of the season…

The Thirteenth Doctor is soon to make her debut…

Mission Impossible: Fallout was freaking AMAZING…

Steve Perry has released a new song or two recently…

The Bohemian Rhapsody movie is coming soon…

New Pokémon games are in the works…

(insert cute picture of a Bulbasaur here ‘cause Tumblr has a picture cap for some reason 😂🍃)

I’m actually getting the feel for college, my new car works great, and I just got on top of a good deal of homework…

I might be blessed with the opportunity to go to a Muse concert next year, my first concert ever… (pre-ordered the new album too!)

And I just had a heartfelt post of mine noticed by one of my favorite actors/people ever?

Screw what the depression tries to say, things are looking good from here! 😄💖

@thehobblefootalchemist @move-you-fascist @ludashiki You guys are a big part of this too! 😊💙

Bright star, keep shinin’ for me,

Shine on to see me through

Bright star, keep shinin’ for me,

And one day I’ll shine for you ~ ⭐

summary:
IN DEPTH FANDOM QUESTIONS - GAME OF THRONES  Other characters you like: (3/3) Olenna Tyrell 

"I did unspeakable things to...
caption:
IN DEPTH FANDOM QUESTIONS - GAME OF THRONES

Other characters you like: (3/3) Olenna Tyrell

“I did unspeakable things to protect my family. Or watched them being done on my orders. I never lost a night’s sleep over them. They were necessary. And whatever I imagined necessary for the safety of House Tyrell, I did.”

summary: [SPOILERS]Who would like to see Dothraki Speech once again before the Long Night the Great War?
title: [SPOILERS]Who would like to see Dothraki Speech once again before the Long Night the Great War?
body:
Dothraki Speech was amazing. Though it is not talked much. But now can we see that again before long Night?

Also after Khal Drogo Dothraki are not on screen much(Lack of story GRRM Should write WoW asap). Also I think there should be some General of Dothraki army after khal Drogo gone just like Greyworm of Unsullied. Why is not shown in the Show?

Dothraki Speech by Daenerys



Source: https://ift.tt/2CaFp8C

summary: tw rape: i’ve been holding this back for a while, but i just have to say something. first of all, my interpretation of jaime and...
body:
tw rape: i’ve been holding this back for a while, but i just have to say something. first of all, my interpretation of jaime and cersei’s sept scene in the books has always been that it was consensual. fucked up, totally, but cersei says yes and even, ahem, “guides him in”.

the show on the other hand, well, that was a rape scene. it was awful, pointless and overall detrimental to the series. grrm himself even spoke out against the changes made, and he hasn’t written a single episode for the show since, when he used to write one or two a season.

NOW, HERE’S WHY I BRING THIS UP! At the time that season four aired, fans from all over the world, including myself, expressed their disgust at this scene as it appears in the TV show. This rage was particularly felt by Jaime and Cersei fans.

I remember seeing essays by various jc stans on tumblr detailing how much they hated hbo’s decision to turn what had been a consensual sex scene between jaime and cersei into a rape. i remember this distinctly because, well, i agreed with them!

fast forward to today, and for some unknown reason, there seems to have been a significant shift amoung jaime and cersei stans. rather than speaking out against the show for the rape scene, they seem more determined to claim that it was always a rape scene, in both show and book.

i just…i don’t understand what happened to create this change? why would anyone willingly want to argue that a consensual sex scene involving their favourite characters was rape? why would you want that?


anyway, it was never rape in the book and hbo are trash.


thank you for your time.

summary: Blu-ray Review: Paul Verhoeven's WWII Thriller BLACK BOOK
title: Blu-ray Review: Paul Verhoeven's WWII Thriller BLACK BOOK
body:
Blu-ray Review: Paul Verhoeven’s WWII Thriller BLACK BOOK

[usr 4 text=”false”]

After Hollow Man in 2000, director Paul Verhoeven turned his back on Hollywood and returned to Europe to make Black Book. This WWII thriller is a wonderfully executed piece, which sees future Game Of Thronesstar Carice van Houten playing a former singer who goes undercover to help the Dutch Resistance. Van Houten is excellent as the conflicted heroine and Verhoeven manages to…

View On WordPress
